mapper.update: update member set password=#{password}, email=#{email}, address=#{address}, tel=#{tel} where id=#{id} and password=#{password}
mapper.select: select m.id,m.password,m.email,m.name,m.tel,m.address,m.member_type,nm.normal_id,nm.gender,nm.picture_path,nm.career_status from member m,normal_member nm where m.id=nm.normal_id and m.id=#{id}
